answers.answer: I have no idea how many people in china are using insulin, but I am sure it is a good number.  People with type 1 diabetes and advanced type 2 diabetes not managed on oral meds, must have insulin or they will die....Some also do use herbals and accupuncture as well, but these are complimentary to and don't replace the appropriate use of insulin.My friend's father has diabetes and listened to chinese medicine doctor who told him he could be treated with Chinese medicine alone.  He ended up very sick in hospital.  Now he takes his insulin without question.
